document.forum_title: Latest News on newsR - Top Headlines and News Videos
document.topic_text: Gina Rinehart employs Sophie Mirabella Friday, 12 August 2016 ( 2 hours ago ) Former MP Sophie Mirabella has been appointed by Gina Rinehart as general manager of government and media relations for Hancock Prospecting.
document.post: Gina Rinehart employs Sophie Mirabella Friday, 12 August 2016 ( 2 hours ago ) Former MP Sophie Mirabella has been appointed by Gina Rinehart as general manager of government and media relations for Hancock Prospecting.
